enhanced_by.reason: Both methods process an ArrayList of strings, making it beneficial to reuse the setup for the ArrayList.
Both methods involve building URLs with different types of parameters, suggesting similar setup requirements.
The method joinStreamUrls(StringBuilder, ArrayList<String>) must be invoked to prepare the streams for the buildStreamUrl method.
URL encoding might be required for the streams, suggesting a potential need to invoke urlEncode before or after buildStreamUrl.
